mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Milanese marquis Giorgio Clerici established a country estate in 1690 on ancestral lakeside land at Tremezzo. The estate was complete in its initial form by 1695. The garden is first mentioned in 1699. [work]

Upon the death of Giorgio Clerici his great grandson Anton Giorgio Clerici (1715-1768) inherited the family fortune and completed the villa in 1745. -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Villa_Carlotta [work]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Architecture and City Planning
